actions.name: createImage
actions.description: Creates an image from a template with provided data.

actions.name: createPdfFromUrl
actions.description: Creates a PDF from a webpage URL.

actions.name: createPdf
actions.description: Creates a PDF from a template with provided data.

actions.name: deleteObject
actions.description: Deletes a generated PDF or image by its transaction reference or object ID.

actions.name: getAccountInformation
actions.description: Retrieves account information including usage statistics and account details.

actions.name: listObjects
actions.description: Retrieves a list of generated PDFs and images with optional filtering
